languages.text:
Seneschal Abelard Werserian is one of the closest associates of the late Theodora von Valancius. He has spent a decade serving the Rogue Trader's protectorate, and he clearly intends to spend another decade keeping a close eye on every negligent servant or under-trained officer.
The elderly Seneschal does not show it, but the death of Theodora, whom he faithfully served for many years, shocked him. Abelard is willing to do anything to ensure that Theodora's successor becomes a brilliant Rogue Trader worthy of {mf|his|her} predecessor.
languages.original_text:
Сенешаль Абеляр Версериан — один из ближайших сподвижников почившей Теодоры фон Валанциус. Он провел десятилетия, служа благу протектората Вольного Торговца, и явно намерен провести еще столько же, зорко следя за каждым нерадивым служкой или недостаточно вышколенным офицером.
Абеляр не подает виду, но гибель Теодоры, которой он верно служил долгие годы, серьезно потрясла пожилого сенешаля. Он готов на все, чтобы {mf|преемник|преемница} Теодоры добил{mf|ся|ась} успеха и стал{mf||а} блистательным Вольным Торговцем, достойн{mf|ым|ой} предшественницы.

traits.locale_text:
Seneschal Abelard Verserian is one of the closest associates of the late Theodora von Valancius. He's spent a decade serving the Rogue Trader's trading empire, and he clearly intends to spend another decade keeping a close eye on every negligent servant or under-trained officer.
Abelard does not show it, but the death of Theodora, whom he faithfully served for many years, shocked the elderly seneschal. He is willing to do anything to ensure that Theodora's successor succeeds and becomes a brilliant Rogue Trader worthy of {mf|his|her} predecessor. But what can such fanatical zeal lead to?

traits.locale_text:
Сенешаль Абеляр Версериан — один из ближайших сподвижников почившей Теодоры фон Валанциус. Он провел десятилетие, служа благу торговой империи Вольного Торговца, и явно намерен провести еще столько же, зорко следя за каждым нерадивым служкой или недостаточно вышколенным офицером.
Абеляр не подает виду, но гибель Теодоры, которой он верно служил долгие годы, серьезно потрясла пожилого сенешаля. Он готов на все, чтобы {mf|преемник|преемница} Теодоры добилась успеха и стал{mf||а} блистательным Вольным Торговцем, достойн{mf|ым|ой} предшественницы. Но к чему может привести такое фанатичное рвение?

languages.text:
阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领是已故的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯最亲密的伙伴之一。在过去的十年内，他一直在为行商浪人的王朝服务、很显然，他打算再花上十年的时间，密切监督每位疏于职务的仆人与欠缺训练的军官。
尽管这位年长的总领并没有表现出任何端倪，但他忠实服务多年的西奥多拉意外身亡，这令他震惊不已。阿贝拉德愿意做出任何事情，确保西奥多拉的继承者成为配得上{mf|他|她}的前任之名的行商浪人。
languages.original_text:
Seneschal Abelard Werserian is one of the closest associates of the late Theodora von Valancius. He has spent a decade serving the Rogue Trader's protectorate, and he clearly intends to spend another decade keeping a close eye on every negligent servant or under-trained officer.
The elderly Seneschal does not show it, but the death of Theodora, whom he faithfully served for many years, shocked him. Abelard is willing to do anything to ensure that Theodora's successor becomes a brilliant Rogue Trader worthy of {mf|his|her} predecessor.

traits.locale_text:
阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领是已故的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯最亲密的伙伴之一。在过去的十年内，他一直在为行商浪人的王朝服务、很显然，他打算再花上十年的时间，密切监督每位疏于职务的仆人与欠缺训练的军官。
尽管这位年长的总领并没有表现出任何端倪，但他忠实服务多年的西奥多拉意外身亡，这令他震惊不已。阿贝拉德愿意做出任何事情，确保西奥多拉的继承者成为配得上{mf|他|她}的前任之名的行商浪人。不过，他这种炽烈的热忱会导致怎样的结果呢？

languages.text:
El Senescal Abelard Werserian es uno de los socios más cercanos de la difunta Theodora von Valancius. Pasó una década al servicio del protectorado de la Comerciante Independiente y claramente tiene intención de pasar otra más vigilando de cerca a cada sirviente negligente u oficial carente de entrenamiento.
El anciano Senescal no lo muestra, pero la muerte de Theodora, a quien sirvió durante años, le ha conmocionado. Abelard hará lo que sea para que {mf|el|la} sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora sea un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente brillante, dign{mf|o|a} de su predecesora.
languages.original_text:
Seneschal Abelard Werserian is one of the closest associates of the late Theodora von Valancius. He has spent a decade serving the Rogue Trader's protectorate, and he clearly intends to spend another decade keeping a close eye on every negligent servant or under-trained officer.
The elderly Seneschal does not show it, but the death of Theodora, whom he faithfully served for many years, shocked him. Abelard is willing to do anything to ensure that Theodora's successor becomes a brilliant Rogue Trader worthy of {mf|his|her} predecessor.

traits.locale_text:
El Senescal Abelard Werserian es uno de los socios más cercanos de la difunta Theodora von Valancius. Pasó una década al servicio del protectorado de la Comerciante Independiente y claramente tiene intención de pasar otra más vigilando de cerca a cada sirviente negligente u oficial carente de entrenamiento.
El anciano Senescal no lo muestra, pero la muerte de Theodora, a quien sirvió durante años, le ha conmocionado. Abelard hará lo que sea para que {mf|el|la} sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora sea un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente brillante, dign{mf|o|a} de su predecesora. Pero ¿adónde le conducirá su fanático fervor?

languages.text:
アベラルド・ウェルザリアン家令長は、故シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの側近の一人だ。彼は自由開拓者の保護領に10年間仕えてきたが、さらに10年間、怠慢な使用人や訓練不足の士官を監視し続けるつもりであることは明らかだ。
年老いた家令長は表には出さないが、長年忠実に仕えてきたシオドーラの死にショックを受けている。アベラルドは、シオドーラの後継者が前任者にふさわしい優秀な自由開拓者になるためなら、どんなことでもするつもりだ。
languages.original_text:
Seneschal Abelard Werserian is one of the closest associates of the late Theodora von Valancius. He has spent a decade serving the Rogue Trader's protectorate, and he clearly intends to spend another decade keeping a close eye on every negligent servant or under-trained officer.
The elderly Seneschal does not show it, but the death of Theodora, whom he faithfully served for many years, shocked him. Abelard is willing to do anything to ensure that Theodora's successor becomes a brilliant Rogue Trader worthy of {mf|his|her} predecessor.

traits.locale_text:
アベラルド・ウェルザリアン家令長は、故シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの側近の一人だ。彼は自由開拓者の保護領に10年間仕えてきたが、さらに10年間、怠慢な使用人や訓練不足の士官を監視し続けるつもりであることは明らかだ。
年老いた家令長は表には出さないが、長年忠実に仕えてきたシオドーラの死にショックを受けている。アベラルドは、シオドーラの後継者が前任者にふさわしい優秀な自由開拓者になるためなら、どんなことでもするつもりだ。

languages.text:
Truchsess Abelard Werserian war einer der engsten Verbündeten der verstorbenen Theodora von Valancius. Er hat ein Jahrzehnt lang dem Protektorat der Freihändlerin gedient und hat nun offenbar vor, ein weiteres Jahrzehnt lang jeden nachlässigen Diener oder schlecht ausgebildeten Offizier im Auge zu behalten.
Der nicht mehr ganz junge Truchsess lässt es sich nicht anmerken, doch der Tod Theodoras, der er jahrelang treu gedient hatte, hat ihn schockiert. Abelard würde alles tun, um dafür zu sorgen, dass Theodoras {mf|Nachfolger zu einem herausragenden Freihändler wird, der seiner|Nachfolgerin zu einer herausragenden Freihändlerin wird, die ihrer} Vorgängerin zur Ehre gereicht.
languages.original_text:
Seneschal Abelard Werserian is one of the closest associates of the late Theodora von Valancius. He has spent a decade serving the Rogue Trader's protectorate, and he clearly intends to spend another decade keeping a close eye on every negligent servant or under-trained officer.
The elderly Seneschal does not show it, but the death of Theodora, whom he faithfully served for many years, shocked him. Abelard is willing to do anything to ensure that Theodora's successor becomes a brilliant Rogue Trader worthy of {mf|his|her} predecessor.

traits.locale_text:
Truchsess Abelard Werserian war einer der engsten Verbündeten der verstorbenen Theodora von Valancius. Er hat ein Jahrzehnt lang dem Protektorat der Freihändlerin gedient und hat nun offenbar vor, ein weiteres Jahrzehnt lang jeden nachlässigen Diener oder schlecht ausgebildeten Offizier im Auge zu behalten.
Der nicht mehr ganz junge Truchsess lässt es sich nicht anmerken, doch der Tod Theodoras, der er jahrelang treu gedient hatte, hat ihn schockiert. Abelard würde alles tun, um dafür zu sorgen, dass Theodoras {mf|Nachfolger zu einem herausragenden Freihändler wird, der seiner|Nachfolgerin zu einer herausragenden Freihändlerin wird, die ihrer} Vorgängerin zur Ehre gereicht. Doch wohin könnte solch fanatischer Eifer führen?

languages.text:
Le sénéchal Abélard Werserian était l'un des plus proches associés de la défunte Théodora von Valancius. Pendant dix ans, il a œuvré au service du protectorat de la libre-marchande et il est bien décidé à en passer au moins dix autres à tenir à l'œil tout serviteur négligent ou officier inexpérimenté.
Si cet homme âgé prend soin de ne pas le montrer, la mort de Théodora, qu'il a fidèlement servie de longues années durant, l'a sérieusement ébranlé. Abélard est prêt à tout pour que la personne qui lui succédera devienne {mf|un brillant libre-marchand|une brillante libre-marchande}, digne de l'empire de sa prédécesseure.
languages.original_text:
Seneschal Abelard Werserian is one of the closest associates of the late Theodora von Valancius. He has spent a decade serving the Rogue Trader's protectorate, and he clearly intends to spend another decade keeping a close eye on every negligent servant or under-trained officer.
The elderly Seneschal does not show it, but the death of Theodora, whom he faithfully served for many years, shocked him. Abelard is willing to do anything to ensure that Theodora's successor becomes a brilliant Rogue Trader worthy of {mf|his|her} predecessor.

traits.locale_text:
Le sénéchal Abélard Werserian était l'un des plus proches associés de la défunte Théodora von Valancius. Pendant dix ans, il a œuvré au service du protectorat de la libre-marchande et il est bien décidé à en passer au moins dix autres à tenir à l'œil tout serviteur négligent ou officier inexpérimenté.
Si cet homme âgé prend soin de ne pas le montrer, la mort de Théodora, qu'il a fidèlement servie pendant de longues années, l'a sérieusement ébranlé. Abélard est prêt à tout pour que son successeur devienne {mf|un brillant libre-marchand|une brillante libre-marchande}, digne de l'empire de sa prédécesseure. Toute la question est de savoir où peut mener cet excès de zèle qui confine parfois au fanatisme...

languages.text:
Seneşal Abelard Werserian, merhume Theodora von Valancius'ın en yakın yaverlerinden biriydi. On yıl boyunca Hür Tacir'in protektorasına hizmet etmiştir ve lakayıt hizmetkârlar ile yeterli eğitim görmemiş subayları yakından takip ederek bir on yıl daha harcamaya niyeti olduğu aşikârdır.
Yıllarca sadakatle hizmet ettiği Theodora'nın ölümü, İhtiyar Seneşal'i çok belli etmese derinden sarsmıştır. Abelard, Theodora'nın vârisinin, selefinin şanına layık bir Hür Tacir olabilmesi için elinden gelen her şeyi yapmaya niyetlidir.
languages.original_text:

The elderly Seneschal does not show it, but the death of Theodora, whom he faithfully served for many years, shocked him. Abelard is willing to do anything to ensure that Theodora's successor becomes a brilliant Rogue Trader worthy of {mf|his|her} predecessor.
